caption.p: ( a) The cytobiocompatibility analysis of green synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles against Vero cell lines compared to plant extract and chemically synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles. (Note: Tukey based heterogeneous lower-case letters represent significant pairs). CLSM images of ( b) untreated Vero cell lines (control), and treated with ( c) plant extract, ( d) chemically synthesized Cr 2O 3, and ( e) green synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles (Live cells with green and dead cells with red) (Scale bar = 50 Âµm).
